hero.title: Discover the NCI Data Sharing Lifecycle
hero.subtitle: NCI's Data Sharing Approach Starts and Ends with the Patient in Mind

mission.title: NCI Office of Data Sharing (ODS) Mission:
mission.description: To direct a comprehensive data sharing vision and strategy for NCI which advocates for proper broad and equitable data sharing and the needs of the cancer research and patient communities.

banner.supportTitle: NCI ODS Supports Broad Data Sharing in 3 Ways
banner.questionText: Have a question about how to share your NCI-funded research?
textFrame: Advise on programs that define impactful data and resources
Implement guidance that promote broad access and use of data
Offer tools and processes that help ensure data are Findable, Accessable, Interoperable, and Resuable (FAIR).
